comments.body: I'd just fling this as a section in the normal readme for hie-core. I wouldn't have thought of hunting for an emacs specific one.
Copy that @neil-da. I'll take care of it Monday. Initial doc. was just to get something going. I'll make it nice and integrate.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +-1,3 @@# How to get `hie-core` working in Emacs

First step is to install required Emacs packages. If you don't already have Melpa config stuff in your `.emacs`, put this stanza at the top.
